name: Steamer Rice
preparation: In Multipurpose Steamer, combine rice and water. Top with tray; microwave uncovered, on high for about 16–18 min, or until tender.
tips: Add your favourite Epicure Broth Mix to your rice while it’s cooking.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 4 oz (113 g) lean protein, 1 cup steamed veggies, and 1 tbsp Epicure Dip.

products.name: Multipurpose Steamer
summary: Like a casserole dish in design & purpose, this cooking utensil is made of silicone & has a 14-cup capacity.
